Qutilities.jl

  • Readme
  • Docstrings
    • Docstrings
    Docstrings
    Qutilities.LOG
    Qutilities.Qutilities
    Qutilities.S_renyi — Function.
    S_renyi(rho::AbstractMatrix, alpha::Real=2)

    Order alpha Rényi entropy of rho.

    The alpha parameter may have any value on the interval [0, Inf] except 1. It defaults to 2.

    Qutilities.S_vn — Function.
    S_vn(rho::AbstractMatrix)

    Von Neumann entropy of rho.

    Qutilities.binent — Function.
    binent(x::Real)

    Binary entropy of x.

    Qutilities.concurrence — Function.
    concurrence(rho::AbstractMatrix)

    Concurrence of a mixed state rho for two qubits in the standard basis.

    Ref: Wootters, W. K. (1998). Entanglement of formation of an arbitrary state of two qubits. Physical Review Letters, 80(10), 2245.

    Qutilities.concurrence_lb — Function.
    concurrence_lb(rho::AbstractMatrix)

    Lower bound on the concurrence for two qubits in the mixed state rho in the standard basis.

    Ref: Mintert, F., & Buchleitner, A. (2007). Observable entanglement measure for mixed quantum states. Physical Review Letters, 98(14), 140505.

    Qutilities.eval
    Qutilities.formation — Function.
    formation(C::Real)

    Entanglement of formation for two qubits with concurrence C.

    Ref: Wootters, W. K. (1998). Entanglement of formation of an arbitrary state of two qubits. Physical Review Letters, 80(10), 2245.

    formation(rho::AbstractMatrix)

    Entanglement of formation for two qubits in the mixed state rho in the standard basis.

    Ref: Wootters, W. K. (1998). Entanglement of formation of an arbitrary state of two qubits. Physical Review Letters, 80(10), 2245.

    Qutilities.hermitize — Function.
    hermitize(rho::AbstractMatrix)

    Make rho Hermitian, but carefully.

    Qutilities.include
    Qutilities.mutinf — Function.
    mutinf(rho::AbstractMatrix, S::Function=S_vn)

    Mutual information of rho using the entropy function S.

    Qutilities.negativity — Function.
    negativity(rho::AbstractMatrix)

    Logarithmic negativity for a symmetric bipartition of rho.

    Ref: Plenio, M. B. (2005). Logarithmic negativity: A full entanglement monotone that is not convex. Physical Review Letters, 95(9), 090503.

    Qutilities.nonneg — Function.
    nonneg(x::Real)

    x if x is non-negative; zero if x is negative.

    Qutilities.ptrace — Function.
    ptrace(rho::AbstractMatrix{T}, dims, which::Int)

    Partial trace of rho along dimension which from dims.

    ptrace(rho::AbstractMatrix, which::Int=2)

    Partial trace of rho along dimension which.

    rho is split into halves and the trace is over the second half by default.

    Qutilities.ptranspose — Function.
    ptranspose(rho::AbstractMatrix, dims, which::Int)

    Partial transpose of rho along dimension which from dims.

    ptranspose(rho::AbstractMatrix, which::Int=2)

    Partial transpose of rho along dimension which.

    rho is split into halves and the transpose is over the second half by default.

    Qutilities.purity — Function.
    purity(rho::AbstractMatrix)

    Purity of rho.

    Qutilities.shannon — Function.
    shannon(xs::AbstractVector)

    Shannon entropy of xs.

    Qutilities.sigma_x
    Qutilities.sigma_y
    Qutilities.sigma_z
    Qutilities.spinflip — Function.
    spinflip(rho::AbstractMatrix)

    Wootters spin-flip operation for two qubits in the mixed state rho in the standard basis.

    Ref: Wootters, W. K. (1998). Entanglement of formation of an arbitrary state of two qubits. Physical Review Letters, 80(10), 2245.
